titleInfo.title: LSU vs. Ole Miss football game, 1972

subject.topic: Louisiana State University and Agricultural and Mechanical College

mods.abstract:
Photographs from the November 4, 1972 game LSU vs. Ole Miss at Tiger Stadium. This series of shots show the last second of the game in which Bert Jones threw a touchdown pass to Brad Davis to tie up the game. The scoreboard images show before and after the touchdown extra point, a diagram of the play, and action shots of the play. Coach Charles McClendon said this after the game: “We always tell our players not to give up even if there’s one second on the board and that’s what it came down to Saturday night.”

The photographs are featured in the 2009 book, Historic Photos of LSU Football, by Barry Cowan and Mark E. Martin.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
